title: The launcher keeps crashing every time it tries to update
body: So a friend of mine has been having a lot of trouble with the recent update, every time she tries to open the launcher and get it to update, the launcher keeps crashing, She's tried uninstalling and reinstalling, she's tried restarting the computer, nothing works. Any tips or advice?

replies.body: Tell her to **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help.
